alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts, Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 29 at 12:49PM MST until May 29 at 8:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT/MST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR MOST OF SOUTHERN NEVADA AND NORTHWEST ARIZONA... * AFFECTED AREA...In Arizona...Fire Weather Zone 102. In Nevada...Fire Weather Zones 460, 461, 462, 463, 464, and 465. * TIMING...Until 8 pm PDT/MST. * WIND...West to northwest wind 20 to 25 mph with gusts 30 to 45 mph. * HUMIDITY...Minimum humidity levels 5 to 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
info.instruction: Outdoor burning is not recommended. Heed all fire restrictions.
